install.install_code: Phpfox::getLib('database')->query("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `" . Phpfox::getT('adsonfeed') . "` ( `ad_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type_id` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `url_link` mediumtext, `html_code` mediumtext, `image_path` varchar(75) DEFAULT NULL, `server_id` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `time_stamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ad_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM ");
